tags.description: Operations related to PDF-exporter settings management
tags.name: Settings

requestBody.description: Export parameters used to locate and check the document for nested lists

200.description: Check completed successfully, returning whether nested lists are present

post.summary: Checks whether document contains nested lists

get.description: Retrieves the status of the CORS configuration.
get.summary: Checks CORS configuration
Checks default settings configuration
Checks DLE Toolbar configuration

200.description: Successfully retrieved document properties pane configuration

get.summary: Checks document properties pane configuration
Checks Live Report configuration

get.description: Retrieves the status of the WeasyPrint configuration.
get.summary: Checks WeasyPrint configuration
Returns basic context information of Polarion's extension

requestBody.description: Export parameters to generate the PDF

200.description: Content of PDF document as a byte array

Content-Disposition.description: To inform a browser that the response is a downloadable attachment

Export-Filename.description: File name for converted PDF document

post.summary: Returns requested Polarion's document converted to PDF

requestBody.description: input html (must include html and body elements)

200.description: Content of PDF document as a byte array

Content-Disposition.description: To inform a browser that the response is a downloadable attachment

Export-Filename.description: File name for converted PDF document

get.summary: Returns all active PDF conversion jobs statuses

requestBody.description: Export parameters to generate the PDF

202.description: Conversion process is started, job URI is returned in Location header

post.summary: Starts asynchronous conversion job of Polarion's document to PDF

202.description: Conversion job is still in progress

303.description: Conversion job is finished successfully, Location header contains result URL

409.description: Conversion job is failed or cancelled

get.summary: Returns PDF conversion job status

Content-Disposition.description: To inform a browser that the response is a downloadable attachment

Export-Filename.description: File name for converted PDF document

204.description: Conversion job is still in progress

409.description: Conversion job is failed, cancelled or result is unreachable

get.summary: Returns PDF conversion job result
Gets language of specified Polarion's document, defined in its custom field 'docLanguage'

requestBody.description: Export parameters similar as for generation of PDF

post.summary: Gets a filename, prepared with velocity and placeholders

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of link role names

get.summary: Gets list of possible WorkItem link role names in specified project scope

requestBody.description: Export parameters to generate the PDF

post.summary: Returns prepared HTML which will be used for PDF conversion using WeasyPrint

get.summary: Gets name of specified Polarion's project
Returns the complete list of all supported features

delete.summary: Deletes images in SVN linked to specified cover page within specified scope (global or certain project)

get.summary: Get list of cover page predefined template names

post.summary: Persist content of cover page predefined template

get.summary: Downloads localization values by name of localization settings

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of style package names

get.summary: Get list of style packages suitable for a document

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of style package names with the weight information

get.summary: Get full list of available style packages for the specific scope with the weight information

requestBody.description: Style packages list with the weight information

post.summary: Update weight information for the provided style packages

get.summary: Returns default values of specified setting
Returns names of specified setting

post.summary: Updates name of specified named setting

get.summary: Returns values (content) of specified setting by its id and revision

put.summary: Creates or updates named setting. Creation scenario will use default setting value if no body specified in the request.

get.summary: Returns revisions history of specified setting with specified id

post.summary: Validates if requested Polarion's document been converted to PDF doesn't contain pages which content exceeds page's width

get.summary: Returns version of Polarion's extension
Gets webhooks status - if they are enabled or not

Context.description: Represents the context for building URLs related to Polarion services

baseUrl.description: Returns the base URL constructed with the extension context

extensionContext.description: The extension context used as a base for URL construction

restUrl.description: Returns the REST API URL constructed with the extension context

swaggerUiUrl.description: Returns the Swagger UI URL for the REST API

ConverterJobDetails.description: Details of the converter job including status and error message if any

errorMessage.description: Error message if the conversion failed

cutEmptyChapters.description: Empty chapters should be removed from the document

cutEmptyWIAttributes.description: Empty work item attributes should be removed from the document

cutLocalUrls.description: Local Polarion URLs should be removed from the document

enableCommentsRendering.description: Comments should be rendered in the exported document

fileName.description: Target file name of exported document

fitToPage.description: Content should be scaled to fit the page

followHTMLPresentationalHints.description: HTML presentational hints should be followed

headersColor.description: Color to be used for headers in the document. By default dark blue color (Polarion's default)

markReferencedWorkitems.description: Referenced work items should be marked in the document

numberedListStyles.description: SCC styles to be applied to numbered lists in the document

projectId.description: The unique identifier for the project

revision.description: The specific revision of the document

additionalProperties.description: Map of attributes extracted from the URL

urlQueryParameters.description: Map of attributes extracted from the URL

watermark.description: Watermark content to be applied to the document

NestedListsCheck.description: Check result indicating whether nested lists are present

containsNestedLists.description: Indicates whether the content contains nested lists

PageInfo.description: Information about a specific page that failed validation, including its number and content.

content.description: The encoded content of the page that failed validation

number.description: The number of the page that failed validation

bundleTimestamp.description: The bundle timestamp of the setting

bundleBuildTimestamp.description: The build timestamp of the bundle

WidthValidationResult.description: Result of the width validation process

WorkItemRefData.description: Data class representing a reference to a work item, including ID, project, layout, and revision

id.description: The unique identifier of the Work item

project.description: The unique identifier of the project to which the Work item belongs

revision.description: The revision number of the Work item
